name: Elections
description: Our independence has finally been achieved and free elections have been written out by the provisionary government to decide the direction of our country.

name: Restoration of the Monarchy
description: The monarchy has enabled Belgium to prosper throughout the 19th Century and is seen as the way forward by many Belgians (especially Flemish) due to the actions of Albert I, the Soldier King.

name: Foundation of the Belgian Republic
description: The monarchy has led to nearly 20 years of German oppression and a loss in the Weltkrieg. Clearly the only way forward is through republicanism.

name: Choose BWP
description: The Belgian Workers Party takes control over the nation

name: Choose LP
description: The Liberal Party under Paul-Emile Janson takes control over the nation

name: Choose KP
description: The Catholic Party under Paul van Zeeland takes control over the nation

name: Choose Verdinaso
description: The people have chosen Joris Van Severen to lead them towards a brighter future!

name: Groote Kuisch
description: The Groote Kuisch or Large Cleanup is the slogan with which Verdinaso was able to sway the election. They promise to eradicate all career politicians and get rid of the weak and opposing members of the Government.

name: Reinforce the Greater Belgian Idea
description: The Belgian Idea was severely damaged by the German occupier who tried to split us between Flemish and Walloons. By organising a large propaganda campaign outlining the successes we achieved together, they seek to reunify the country behind the Belgian flag.

name: Secularise the State
description: The Catholic Party has far too much influence in our country. Only a full sweep of the party's influence can prevent their power from growing out of control.

name: Subsidise the Industry
description: With the Catholic Party on the decline and militarism rising, it's time to launch a full scale programme reinvigorating our crumbling industry and increase our arms export.

name: Unite with the Catholic Parties
description: The influence of the Catholics stretches far and wide and would be a big boon for our further plans. By rallying priests and teachers behind our cause, we can better indoctrinate the population and reinforce our militarism.

name: Subsidise the Boerenbond
description: The Catholics have come up with a plan to support the agrarian region of Flanders by creating the Boerenbond. Helping them accomplish their goals would not only tighten our bond but free up manpower necessary for the armed forces.

name: Look Towards Expansion
description: Foreign invaders were responsible for the Rape of Belgium, yet our neighbours stood idly and let us fall prey to the German giant. Through sweeping rhetoric and propaganda campaings our population has been riled up and expects the Government to right this wrong.

name: Rectify the Treaty of London
description: Even though we held on to Limburg and Luxemburg during the war for Independence, we had to return these lands under British pressure. This time however Britain is far away and unable to aid the Dutch

name: Integrate the Dutch Provinces
description: The Dutch lay defeated at our feet and the Belgian Flag waves in Amsterdam. Dietsland is one step closer to realisation.

name: Reclaim the Old Flemish Borders
description: We may have lost French Flanders to the French during the 17th century but Flemish remained the important language until only a century ago. Now is the time to liberate our Flemish brethren and lift the darkness called syndicalism!

name: Integrate French Flanders
description: Lille is Rijsel once more and in the Harbours of Duinkerke and Kales Flemish indoctrinatation and relocation programs are securing our grip over the region.

name: Reclaim Our Rightful Place in the World
description: We have shown the world that Belgium cannot be ignored. We stood our ground and enlarged our territory. Who knows what the future may bring?

name: Expand the Boerenbond
description: The farmers of Flanders were heavily hit by Black Monday. Therefore the KP has proposed the creation of a farmer organisation free from the grasps of the unions.

name: Improve Working Conditions
description: The Weekend should be holy and our workers shouldn't be oppressed. By passing this act to introduce the 40-hour week we can take some wind out of the syndicalist sails and further consolidate our power.

name: Expand the State Companies
description: The State companies like the NMBS and the postal service are in dire need of reinvention. Expanding these organisations creates jobs and will provide better services to the population.

name: Strive towards Federation
description: Only by federating our country can we stop the increasing separatism between Walloons and Flemish.

name: Reinforce Belgicism
description: Belgicism is more important than being a Wallon or a Flemish citizen. We are all equal and are stronger if we work together.

name: Strive Towards Confederation
description: The Flemish and Walloons will never be able to fully work together, therefore it's best to decentralise the Government and allow self-governance for the different regions.

name: Create the Economic Regions
description: By creating the economic regions separating the Flemish Region, the Walloon Region and the Brussels-Capital Region we can further focus ourselves on the need of the individual instead of the collective.

name: Fund Catholic Education
description: Catholic education is the foundation of our excellent education system and should only be further expanded reaching even more students.

name: Large State Investments
description: New jobs will have to be created to recover from the Economic crisis and this can only be done by large investments by the State.

name: Decrease Government Control
description: Belgian bureaucracy is a convoluted mess mainly created to let the Catholic party pay out its supporters. By cutting heavily in their organisations we can let the invisible hand steer us.

name: Encourage Corporations
description: By allowing the large corporations more free reign we can persuade them to stay in Belgium and expand further.

name: Excavation Permits
description: The Limburg coal mines and the Walloon steel mills are an important aspect of our economy and by giving them more self-governance we can increase our capacity.

name: Focus on Exports
description: Protectionism will not help our nation forward. We need to open up our borders and spread our goods to the whole globe.

name: Free Scientific Research
description: Scientific progress cannot be hindered by Catholic funding. By opening up our purse for all that wish to innovate we can keep our competitive edge.

name: Reform the Party
description: Many of our members have lost their way, prioritising their own gains over those of the working class. A large shake-up will have to be executed eliminating these weak factions and uniting the BWP behind Jacquemotte.

name: Introduce the 8-Hour Workday
description: Even though the German occupier has on multiple occasions promised to introduce the 8-hour workday they never did. As such it is only logical to kick off our socialist revolution with this long promised act.

name: Expand the Cooperatives
description: The cooperatives are the backbone of our socialist structure. By cooperation between different unions and professions we were able to create larger structures which could better provide for the workers at a lower cost. Famous examples like the Cooperative Vooruit in Ghent were able to expand this process and become large breeding grounds for the BWP resulting in better working conditions.

name: Industrialise the Countryside
description: While our influence has grown steadily across the nation, the countryside is still mostly agrarian and thus is more Catholic leaning than the industrialised cities of Liege or Charleroi. Large scale industrial investments will boost our economy and will spread syndicalism to all sides of our nation.

name: Introduce Plan Spaak
description: Convinced that only through large scale government investments and a more streamlined bureaucracy Belgium can recover from the depression caused by Black Monday, Spaak has gathered all members of the BWP to explain his plan.

name: Introduce Plan De Man
description: To fight against the rising popularity of populists and the threat of syndicalism, De Man has introduced a large scale economic overhaul dubbed Plan De Man that will change our economic policy drastically.

name: Instate Economic Secretaries
description: By appointing 5 economic secretaries consisting of union leaders and technocrats we will be able to quickly adapt to changes in the economic landscape without compromising the working class.

name: Nationalise Basic Industry
description: To combat rising unemployment and reduce our dependence on the global market, all basic industries will be nationalised allowing for better government control.

name: Expand Processing Industry
description: To better control the entire industrial process we will complete our basic industry with an expanded processing industry allowing for bigger and better outputs.

name: Finish Plan De Man
description: Multiple administrative affairs and overhauls of lesser state structures are to be revamped allowing for easy completion of our plan.

name: Reform the Ministries
description: If you wish to gain an D183 clearance you have to go through three different ministries, return four times to your local town hall and wait for up to a year before finally being turned down. No more! Under the guidance of Spaak the system will be streamlined and stop punishing workers and investors with needless complexities.

name: Expand Infrastructure
description: To combat rising unemployment large government funded infrastructure works will be undertaken supporting both our industrial needs and our growing population.

name: Focus on Small Business
description: In a world where population determines your industrial capacity we can no longer compete with the giants like Germany and the USA. Therefore small business and startups will be funded improving our wealth.

name: Finish Plan Spaak
description: By gathering support within the party and using Spaaks influence in the Liberale Partij we will swiftly push through our plans.

name: Create the Belgian Cooperative Union
description: The time has come for the workers to throw off the shackles imposed on them by capitalist politicians. We will proclaim the Belgian Cooperative Union, outlining our new direction and to show our neigbours the successes of the revolution.

name: Foreign Policy
description: With Belgium independent and rising tensions abroad, it is time to establish our own ministry of foreign affairs and try to establish our position in the world.

name: Deterrence
description: Belgium has seen enough fighting. We will try to deter foreign attacks by reinforcing our borders and foremost establish good relations with the major powers.

name: Demand Guarantee from the Entente
description: We will try to once more receive a guarantee from the House of Windsor and to rely on their aid if the Germans attack.

name: Fortify Antwerp
description: With enemies on all of our borders, we have no choice but to fall back to Antwerp in case of attack. We shall protect the Harbour and ensure that reinforcements from the Entente can arrive as soon as possible.

name: Demand Guarantee from the Internationale
description: Our syndicalist brethren are our best shot at defending our self from the Germans. We are however not ready to fully commit our self to the Internationale and would prefer it if they could just guarantee our independence.

name: Build the Meuse Defence Line
description: With French backing, we are able to take position behind the Meuse and a large complex of fortresses and bunkers should deter their attack as well.

name: Demand Guarantee from the German Empire
description: The only way we will ensure that the Kaiser doesn't take revenge for our independence war is by making sure that they guarantee our independence. They are however not very inclined to assist us and will demand steep reparations for the damage we caused them.

name: Fortify the Westwall
description: With no threat of a German invasion, we can focus our resources on securing the French border to deter their attack.

name: The Last Line of Defence
description: Our plan has failed, enemy forces are storming the Belgian countryside and we will need all able-bodied men to take position and defend Belgian Freedom.

name: Neutrality
description: We will distance ourself as much as possible from foreign conflicts and will try again where we failed in the Weltkrieg.

name: Encourage Free Trade
description: By focusing on a free trade policy, we will be able to further prove our intentions of peace and neutrality.

name: Expand Arms sales
description: With conflicts raging from America to Asia, Belgian arms manufacturers like FRC and FN are expanding their production facilities to meet demands.

name: Our Place on the World Stage
description: It's time for Belgium to step out of the shadows and ensure a strong place on the international playing field.

name: Improve Commonwealth Ties
description: We will improve our relations with the countries of the Entente and Canada and we will start to pave the way for a possible Belgian entry in their alliance.

name: Join the Entente
description: With relations improved, we can finally decide to take the big step and formally give them our proposal for a Belgo-Canadian alliance.

name: Improve Dutch Relations
description: Relations with our northern neighbours have always been good and further expanding this friendship we hope to ensure their support when we make our play on the world map.

name: A Belgo-Dutch Alliance?
description: We will offer the Dutch our proposal for a Belgo-Dutch alliance which should improve the power projection of both our countries.

name: Create the Koninklijke Academie
description: We will create a Royal Academy consisting of the top minds of both Belgium and the Netherlands. Sponsored by the Royal houses of Belgium en Nassau, we will bring our alliance to the front of technological innovation.

name: Help the Syndicalist Cause
description: Socialism seeks to liberate the earth from all manner of tyranny and the Third Internationale is at the forefront of that great struggle. Let us pledge our dedication to this great cause.

name: Join the Internationale
description: The nations of the Third Internationale know beyond a shadow of a doubt that we shall stand firmly with them. Let us formally request this great alliance.
